about:
I'm Loren and in my spare time I'm a passionate climber and mountain biker. On the side, I try to work on projects and try out new technologies as much as my time allows. This is also where my App for climbers came into being, as a digital route book with graphic evaluation.
Professionally, I have been working as a Full Stack Freelancer for Vertical Life and NO-Q since July 2022. Before that I was with DATEV eG in Nürnberg, als Inhouse Consultant angestellt und hier in vielen Projekten tätig. Davor habe ich für das Leibniz Institute for Ecological and Regional Development as a research assistant. During this time I designed and implemented the IÖR-Monitor, which is used as a cartographic information medium on land use issues. I am passionate about writing test-driven clean code and always try to keep up to date. state of the art.

datev.work:
• Conception and development of API’s for bidirectional data exhange between on-premises and external partner systems
  • Front-End development with Angular
  • DevOps for Continuous Integration und Delivery
  • Internal consultant in several projects, with Spring Reactive/MVC or Kotlin

ioer.company: Leibniz Institute of Ecological Urban and Regional Development
ioer.work:
• Implementation and architecture of the Web-GIS Monitor of Settlement and Open Space Development (IOER Monitor), with a React Frontend and Python/PHP Backend
  • Development and make available of Web-Processing-Services for spatial calculations of indicator values as API within the SoRa research project
  • Supervision of Master's theses

uni.company: Leibniz Institute of Ecological Urban and Regional Development
uni.work:
• Design and implementation of an Android app for interaction with inticator maps
  • Conception and implementation of a web application, for the administration of geo services with Flask and React
